title: Oregon Caves National Monument & Preserve: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping         The historic Chateau offers lodging, dining and gift galleries. NPS  We know that everyone needs to eat and sleep! Oregon Caves National Monument and Preserve provides great options:   Grand Lodge (20+ rooms) Cave Creek Campground Two restaurants ranging from fine dining to a historic caf√© diner.  For lodging or dinner reservations:  Visit: The Chateau at the Oregon Caves Write: 20000 Caves Hwy, Cave Junction, OR 97523 Call: (541) 592-3400  Additional Information: Be sure to check operating hours and seasons in the park. Please make reservations early. For information on lodging or camping outside the park, visit Lodging Near the Monument or Area Campgrounds
